gui.armorplus.info.text_line_three: If you want to change to Easy Mode
gui.armorplus.info.text_line_four: you will need to change the config
enchantment.armorplus.life_steal.desc: Steal's the attacked entity's health and heals you
enchantment.armorplus.furious.desc: When hit you get furious, giving you strength and speed boost based on level.
enchantment.armorplus.enhanced.desc: Greatly improves your armor piece (only applicable to vanilla Chainmale, Iron, Gold, Diamond armors)
armorplus.jei.guardian_scale.desc: Used to craft the Guardian weapons, armor and the Ultimate Material. Dropped by the Elder Guardian and by Guardians.
armorplus.jei.wither_bone.desc: Used to craft the Super Star weapons, armor and the Ultimate Material. Dropped by The Wither Boss and by Wither Skeletons.
armorplus.jei.ender_dragon_scale.desc: Used to craft the Ender Dragon weapons, armor and the Ultimate Material. Dropped by the Ender Dragon and Ender Dragon Zombies.
armorplus.jei.lava_infuser.desc: Used for infusing Lava Crystals and Obsidian blocks into Lava Infused Obsidian. You need to provide it with lava buckets in order to work.
modifier.firestorm.desc: §oThe real Super Nova!§r\nBonus fire damage, sets your enemies on fire.
commands.armorplus.error.arg.player.miss: You must specify which player you wish to perform this action on.
commands.armorplus.error.perm: You do not have permission to use this command.
commands.armorplus.help.help: Displays the help information for the "/armorplus" command.
commands.armorplus.wiki.help: Opens a Link in your browser to the ArmorPlus Wiki
commands.armorplus.wiki.link_open: Opens a link to ArmorPlus' wiki
commands.armorplus.nodecraft.about.text: This project is sponsored by Nodecraft.
commands.armorplus.nodecraft.promo.end.t: for %s off your first month of service!
commands.armorplus.nodecraft.help: Displays the promo code for Nodecraft.
commands.armorplus.discord.line_one.hove: Opens a discord link to armorplus' discord
commands.armorplus.discord.line_two.hove: Opens a discord link to sokratis12GR's discord
gui.armorplus.config.title: ArmorPlus Configuration
armorplus.tgotg.tooltip: Configurations for The Gift Of The Gods item
armorplus.ender_dragon_zombie.tooltip: Configurations for the Ender Dragon Zombie entity
armorplus.lava_crystal.tooltip: Configuration for the Ore Lava Crystal's world generation
armorplus.tower.tooltip: Configuration for the Nether Tower's world generation
achievement.armorplus.craft_super_star_a: craft a Super Star Armor Piece
achievement.armorplus.craft_ender_dragon: The Power of the Ender Dragon!
Kill the Ender Dragon and craft an Ender Dragon Armor Piece
achievement.armorplus.craft_pig_iron_arm: craft a Pig Iron Armor Piece
achievement.armorplus.craft_knight_slime: craft a Knight Slime Armor Piece
achievement.armorplus.craft_workbench.de: craft the a Workbench from ArmorPlus
achievement.armorplus.craft_high_tech_be: craft the a High-Tech Bench from ArmorPlus
achievement.armorplus.craft_ulti_tech_be: craft the an Ulti-Tech Bench from ArmorPlus
achievement.armorplus.craft_champion_ben: This is only for real Champions
craft the a Champion Bench from ArmorPlus
commands.armorplus.abilities.clear.succe: You have successfully removed all abilities from this item.
commands.armorplus.abilities.clear.fail: This item doesn't contain any abilities.
commands.armorplus.abilities.add.fail: Sorry, cannot add more abilities to this item. Your limit [%d/%d].
commands.armorplus.abilities.add.fail.al: Sorry, this ability is already provided to this item.
commands.armorplus.abilities.add.success: You have successfully added the [%s] ability to this item.
commands.armorplus.abilities.add.hide.us: Use hide to not show the command's output.
commands.armorplus.abilities.add.incorre: You cannot add [%s] to this item.
commands.armorplus.abilities.usage.secon: Incomplete command arguments. Use /armorplus abilities add <string: abilityID>
commands.armorplus.abilities.wrong_item: This command can only be used on ArmorPlus items.
commands.armorplus.abilities.limit: This item has a limit of [%d/%d] abilities.
commands.armorplus.abilities.limit.set.u: Incomplete command arguments. Use /armorplus abilities limit set <int: limit>
commands.armorplus.abilities.limit.set: Sucessfully set the limit of this item to %s/%s
commands.armorplus.abilities.remove.usag: Incomplete command arguments. Use /armorplus abilities remove <string: abilityID>
commands.armorplus.abilities.remove.fail: You cannot remove [%s] because it doesn't exist.
info.armorplus.abilities.cost: You have enough coal [%s] to unlock night vision
info.armorplus.abilities.cost.missing: You don't have enough stats/items to unlock any abilities
item.armorplus.lava_crystal.desc: Can be obtained by mining Ore Lava Crystal
item.armorplus.infused_lava_crystal.desc: Can be created by infusing the Lava Crystal inside the Lava Infuser
item.armorplus.dev_tool.desc_one: §cOnly works if debugMode is set to true in the configuration file [debugMode:%s]
dialogs.armorplus.skeletal_king.line_one: You really think you even want to get me started with you?
This fight will be over way before it even starts.
dialogs.armorplus.skeletal_king.line_thr: It seems that you are enjoying my minions...
Well, I got some news to you.
dialogs.armorplus.skeletal_king.line_fou: There is no escape from me!
dialogs.armorplus.skeletal_king.line_six: Nothing can stop me from destroying this world
If my minions, cannot kill you. then I'll kill you myself!
Minions, CHARGE with your full power!!!
dialogs.armorplus.skeletal_king.death_li: The end is near, but remember I'll be BACK
And there will be an END to this world.
error.world_gen.armorplus.generator_heig: Illegal Height Arguments for WorldGenerator. Min height must in the range (0, %d) [Value: %d]. Max height must not be greater than 256. [Value: %d]
